centerName: BARROW STREET NURSERY SCHOOL AT THE GREENWICH HOUSE INC
permitHolder: BARROW STREET NURSERY SCHOOL GREENWICH HOUSE

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required Violations corrected at time of inspection

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed that child care service failed to provide appropriate guards on designated structures/equipment to protect children from potential injury
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
At time of inspection it was determined/observed that food service worker not provided with appropriate food thermometer during food prep
